about_the_game:
Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by the Medved-Taiga National Park.

This Pack Contains:
- Medved-Taiga Orange Paint
- Medved-Taiga White Paint
- Medved-Taiga Grey Paint
- Medved-Taiga Blue Paint
- Medved-Taiga Dark Purple Paint
- Medved-Taiga Snow Sprig Spray
- Medved-Taiga Twig Spray
- Medved-Taiga Stripe Spray
- Medved-Taiga Cherry Wood
- Medved-Taiga Walnut Wood
- Medved-Taiga Brushstroke Camo
- Medved-Taiga Multicam Camo
- Medved-Taiga Woodland Camo
- Medved-Taiga Premium Wrap

The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.
